nl_query: Retrieve the total visitors and CTR for the specified webpage, broken down by market. Count unique visitors and actions triggering CTR events such as 'Join the Waiting List' and 'Build Your Own' for Land Rover.
sql:
DECLARE start_date_pre_change DATE DEFAULT DATE('2025-01-01');
DECLARE end_date_post_change DATE DEFAULT DATE('2025-01-28');

WITH CTE_sessions AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        h.market_code,
        h.visitor_id,
        h.session_id,
        h.page_path,
        s.bounced_session,
        s.device_category,
        s.channel_grouping,
        s.medium,
        h.hit_datetime AS visit_datetime,
        h.visit_start_date
    FROM `jlr-dl-dxa.PRD_GA4.GA4_hit` h
    LEFT JOIN `jlr-dl-dxa.PRD_GA4.GA4_session` s
        ON h.session_id = s.session_id
    WHERE 
        h.visit_start_date BETWEEN start_date_pre_change AND end_date_post_change
        AND s.visit_start_date BETWEEN start_date_pre_change AND end_date_post_change
        AND h.market_code IN ("US", 'CA', 'GB')
        AND h.page_path IN ('www.landrover.co.uk/index.html', 'www.landroverusa.com/index.html', 'www.landrover.ca/en/index.html',
                             'www.landroverusa.com/range-rover/index.html', 'www.landroverusa.com/defender/index.html', 'www.landroverusa.com/discovery/index.html',
                             "www.landrover.co.uk/range-rover/index.html", "www.landrover.co.uk/defender/index.html", "www.landrover.co.uk/discovery/index.html",
                             "www.landrover.ca/en/range-rover/index.html", "www.landrover.ca/en/defender/index.html", "www.landrover.ca/en/discovery/index.html")
        AND h.brand = "Land Rover"
),

CTE_events AS (
    SELECT
        s.market_code,
        s.visitor_id,
        s.device_category,
        s.channel_grouping,
        s.medium,
        s.visit_start_date,
        s.session_id,
        hit.hit_datetime,
        hit.page_path,
        CASE 
            WHEN event_label IN (
                'JOIN THE WAITING LIST :: cta-content',
                'KEEP ME INFORMED :: cta-content',
                'FIND OUT MORE :: cta-content',
                'BUILD YOUR OWN :: cta-content',
                'BUILD AND ORDER :: secondary-link None',
                'EXPLORE :: cta-content',
                'BUILD AND ORDER :: cta-content',
                'BOOK YOUR TEST DRIVE :: secondary-link None',
                'CHECK AVAILABILITY :: secondary-link None',
                'EXPLORE FINANCE OPTIONS :: secondary-link None',
                'BUILD AND RESERVE :: cta-content',
                'LEARN MORE :: cta-content',
                'BUILD AND RESERVE :: secondary-link None',
                'ENTER :: HouseOfBrandHome__single-cta'
            ) THEN 'CTR'
        END AS event_type,
        CASE 
            WHEN s.bounced_session = 1 THEN hit.visitor_id
        END AS bounced_visitor
    FROM CTE_sessions s
    JOIN `jlr-dl-dxa.PRD_GA4.GA4_hit` hit
        ON s.session_id = hit.session_id
        AND hit.hit_datetime > s.visit_datetime
)

SELECT
    rc.market_code,
    rc.page_path, 
    rc.device_category,
    rc.channel_grouping,
    rc.medium, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT rc.visitor_id) AS total_page_visitors,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'CTR' THEN e.visitor_id END) AS CTR,
    COUNT(DISTINCT e.bounced_visitor) AS total_bounced_visitor
FROM CTE_sessions rc
LEFT JOIN CTE_events e 
    ON rc.visitor_id = e.visitor_id 
    AND rc.page_path = e.page_path
    AND rc.visit_start_date = e.visit_start_date
GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5;

nl_query: Retrieve the total number of unique visitors for the Land Rover webpage 'www.landrover.co.uk/index.html' for January 1â€“2, 2025. Group the data by market, page path, device category, channel grouping, and visit start date.
sql: SELECT DISTINCT h.market_code, h.page_path, s.device_category, s.channel_grouping, h.visit_start_date, COUNT(DISTINCT h.visitor_id) as total_visitors FROM `jlr-dl-dxa.PRD_GA4.GA4_hit` h LEFT JOIN `jlr-dl-dxa.PRD_GA4.GA4_session` s ON h.session_id = s.session_id WHERE h.visit_start_date BETWEEN DATE('2025-01-01') AND DATE('2025-01-02') AND s.visit_start_date BETWEEN DATE('2025-01-01') AND DATE('2025-01-02') AND h.market_code IN ('US', 'CA', 'GB') AND h.page_path IN ('www.landrover.co.uk/index.html') AND h.brand = 'Land Rover' GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5;

nl_query: Retrieve the number of unique visitors for the Range Rover Sport webpage, grouped by campaign, channel grouping, and referrer. Aggregate data by visit start date, truncated to weeks for trend analysis.
sql: SELECT h.market_code, s.campaign, s.channel_grouping, s.medium, s.referrer, DATE_TRUNC(h.visit_start_date, WEEK) AS week, h.visit_start_date, COUNT(DISTINCT h.visitor_id) AS total_users FROM `jlr-dl-dxa.PRD_GA4.GA4_hit` h LEFT JOIN `jlr-dl-dxa.PRD_GA4.GA4_session` s ON h.session_id = s.session_id WHERE h.visit_start_date BETWEEN DATE('2024-09-01') AND DATE('2024-09-01') AND s.visit_start_date BETWEEN DATE('2024-09-01') AND DATE('2024-09-01') AND h.brand = 'Land Rover' AND page_path LIKE '%range-rover/range-rover-sport/index.html' GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7
